sources.form.vue:
<template>
<a-card class="card">
  <a-form :form="form" @submit="handleSubmit">
    <a-form-item
      v-for="(k, index) in form.getFieldValue('keys')"
      :key="k"
      v-bind="index === 0 ? formItemLayout : formItemLayoutWithOutLabel"
      :label="index === 0 ? 'whiteIP' : ''"
      :required="false"
    >
    
      <a-input
        v-decorator="[
          `names[${k}]`,
          {
            validateTrigger: ['change', 'blur'],
            rules: [
              {
                required: true,
                whitespace: true,
                message: 'Please input whiteIP or delete this field.',
              },
            ],
          },
        ]"
        placeholder="请输入IP"
        style="width: 60%; margin-right: 8px"
        allow-clear
      >
      </a-input>
      <a-icon
        v-if="form.getFieldValue('keys').length > 1"
        class="dynamic-delete-button"
        type="minus-circle-o"
        :disabled="form.getFieldValue('keys').length === 1"
        @click="() => remove(k)"
      />
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item v-bind="formItemLayoutWithOutLabel">
      <a-button type="dashed" style="width: 60%" @click="add">
        <a-icon type="plus" ></a-icon>添加
      </a-button>
    </a-form-item>

    <a-form-item v-bind="formItemLayoutWithOutLabel">
      <a-button type="primary" html-type="submit">Submit</a-button>
    </a-form-item>

  </a-form>
    </a-card>
</template>

<script>
import Vue from 'vue'

let id = 0;
export default Vue.extend({
    data() {
    return {
      formItemLayout: {
        labelCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 4 },
        },
        wrapperCol: {
          xs: { span: 24 },
          sm: { span: 20 },
        },
      },
      formItemLayoutWithOutLabel: {
        wrapperCol: {
          xs: { span: 24, offset: 0 },
          sm: { span: 20, offset: 4 },
        },
      },
    };
   },
 beforeCreate() {
    this.form = this.$form.createForm(this, { name: 'dynamic_form_item' });
    this.form.getFieldDecorator('keys', { initialValue: [], preserve: true });
  },

  methods: {
    remove(k) {
      const { form } = this;
      // can use data-binding to get
      const keys = form.getFieldValue('keys');
      // console.log(`keys:${keys}`)
      // We need at least one passenger
      if (keys.length === 1) {
        return;
      }

      // can use data-binding to set
      form.setFieldsValue({
        keys: keys.filter(key => key !== k),
      });
    },

    add() {
      const { form } = this;
      // can use data-binding to get
      const keys = form.getFieldValue('keys');

      const nextKeys = keys.concat(id++);
      // can use data-binding to set
      // important! notify form to detect changes
      form.setFieldsValue({
        keys: nextKeys,
      });
    },

    handleSubmit(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      this.form.validateFields((err, values) => {
        if (!err) {
          const { keys, names } = values;
          const mergedValues = keys.map(key => names[key])
          this.axios.post("http://172.25.73.71:3000/getLatestVerInfo",{
            whiteList:mergedValues
          }).then(res=>{
            console.log(res)
          })
          console.log('Received values of form: ', values);
          console.log(
            'Merged values:',
            mergedValues
          );
        }
      });
    },

  },
});
</script>

<style >
html,body{
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
}
.card{
  width: 500px;
  /* height: 100%; */
  position: relative;
  left: 50%;
  top: 50%;
 transform: translate(-50%,-50%);
 background-color: rgba(141, 193, 65,0.1) !important;
}
.dynamic-delete-button {
  cursor: pointer;
  position: relative;
  top: 4px;
  font-size: 24px;
  color: #999;
  transition: all 0.3s;
}
.dynamic-delete-button:hover {
  color: #ff4d4f;
}
.dynamic-delete-button[disabled] {
  cursor: not-allowed;
  opacity: 0.5;
}
</style>
